name: Genethic IRC Server Monitor
short_description: Genethic IRC Server Monitor is a perl bot which has started being written by the administrator of Geneva.CH.EU.Undernet.org in August of 2001. It is monitoring your IRC server, publishing almost all of the stats in a webpage.
